items.sentence: I\'m pretty sure the first thing you\'ll want to do when you get to Boston is call home.
How do you know you wouldn\'t have done the same thing Tom did if you were in his shoes?
I don\'t understand and I\'m not used to not understanding. Please explain it once more.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom showed up at my party because Mary told me he\'d be coming.
Tom was drinking at a bar with Mary at the time the police think that John was murdered.
When I study a foreign language, I like to study with a native speaker of that language.
Tom didn\'t seem to be at all interested in Mary\'s explanation about what had happened.
I bought myself an expensive guitar even though I don\'t yet know how to play very well.
Tom can\'t decide whether to buy a new computer now or wait for a couple of more months.
Tom wants Mary to know that if she ever needs help, all she has to do is ask him for it.
